UI_visible_response: Read 25 web pagesView Page Details"China's Wailing Wall" refers to the Weibo page of Dr. Li Wenliang. After his death, hundreds of thousands of netizens left replies on his final post, sharing their grief and thoughts. traffic_visible_response: "China's Wailing Wall" refers to the Weibo page of Dr. Li Wenliang. After his death, hundreds of thousands of netizens left replies on his final post, sharing their grief and thoughts[^3^]. Similar to how people leave written prayers in the cracks of the Western Wall in Jerusalem, netizens used Dr. Li's Weibo page to express their emotions[^2^][^4^].
